Key Match Events: Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav shared a crucial 91-run stand
Dasun Shanaka scored an unbeaten 56 runs
India lost the top-order early with just 21 runs on the scoreboard
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya took some tough decisions in critical situations in the first match
Shubman Gill and Yuzvendra Chahal failed to create any impact in the first T20I
Arshdeep Singh is expected to return to the side after recovering from the illness
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium, Pune
